=== Description ===
The following list describes SRU bugs for the 8.04.2 point release which were in -proposed but had not yet been verified.  Half way through going through this list of bugs to ask for testing it seems the kernel was moved from -proposed to -updates.  Talk about timing.  Anyways here's a status so far.  I'll go ahead and continue to ask for testing on the released kernel.  Thanks.
